issue.title: [C++] Compilation failure on s390x platform
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15563](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15563). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
 
```java

(pyarrow-dev) [root@s390x]# cmake -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=$ARROW_HOME       -DCMAKE_INSTALL_LIBDIR=lib       -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=debug       -DARROW_WITH_BZ2=ON       -DARROW_WITH_ZLIB=ON       -DARROW_WITH_ZSTD=ON       -DARROW_WITH_LZ4=ON       -DARROW_WITH_SNAPPY=ON       -DARROW_WITH_BROTLI=ON       -DARROW_PARQUET=ON       -DARROW_PYTHON=ON       -DARROW_BUILD_TESTS=ON       ..

make[2]: *** [src/arrow/CMakeFiles/arrow_objlib.dir/build.make:1224: src/arrow/CMakeFiles/arrow_objlib.dir/util/value_parsing.cc.o] Error 1
make[2]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
make[1]: *** [CMakeFiles/Makefile2:1565: src/arrow/CMakeFiles/arrow_objlib.dir/all] Error 2
make: *** [Makefile:146: all] Error 2
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15563?focusedCommentId=17488295) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
[~mr.chandureddy]  Have you tried with Arrow 6.0.0 or 7.0.0?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15563?focusedCommentId=17488531) by Kazuaki Ishizaki (kiszk):*
Sure, I will look at this

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15563?focusedCommentId=17493397) by Kazuaki Ishizaki (kiszk):*
This problem does not occur in the master branch. This is because [the latest parse_number.h](https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/cpp/src/arrow/vendored/fast_float/parse_number.h) does not have this statement.

So, it would be good to pick up the recent version of Arrow.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15563?focusedCommentId=17493924) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Perhaps we can close this issue then.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15563?focusedCommentId=17493936) by Chandra Shekhar Reddy (mr.chandureddy):*
Thank you `[~apitrou]`   and `[~kiszk]` . Let me check with latest code and then get back to you.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15563?focusedCommentId=17497299) by Chandra Shekhar Reddy (mr.chandureddy):*
`[~apitrou]`   and `[~adeetikaushal]` I was able to build the PyArrow 7.0.0 with out any issues. Thank you !

On the other hand issue https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15645  makes me worried to move to greater level of PyArrow versions on ZLinux.

Please advise. Thank you !

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15563?focusedCommentId=17497454) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
[~mr.chandureddy] I suggest you follow ARROW-15645 for updates. Thank you for this report!
